# <type>(<scope>): <subject>
#
# types: feat | fix | docs | style | refactor | perf | test | build | ci | chore | revert
# scope: 可选，模块/目录/功能名，如 api, web, cli
# subject: 简短描述，使用祈使句，避免首字母大写与句号结尾
#
# body: 可选，说明动机、变更细节、兼容性影响
#
# footer: 可选，关联 Issue/PR 或 重大变更说明
# BREAKING CHANGE: 描述

# 示例：
# feat(api): support unified OpenAI responses endpoint
# fix(web): avoid double redirect on /admin-next
# docs: add deployment notes for caddy
